definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Thermal-comfortable elastic polyurethane knitted fabrics may be manufactured by two methods.
sentences.chinese: 热湿舒适性氨纶弹力针织面料可由两种方法形成。

sentences.english: Design is brief with flexibility, and it is dressed comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 简洁的设计，回弹力好，随体舒适。

sentences.english: The Nike shox has a slot beneath the cushion that lines the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 耐克弹力柱鞋在鞋垫下方有一个狭缝。

sentences.english: The color of the tubes and handles can be produced according to your demand.
sentences.chinese: 以上产品手把和弹力管的颜色客户可以自定搭配。

sentences.english: If you have varicose veins, consider wearing elastic support hose.
sentences.chinese: 如果患了静脉曲张，可以考虑穿弹力护腿袜。

sentences.english: Besmear freezing liquid, about 45 minutes remove elastic bandage.
sentences.chinese: 涂上冷冻液，大约45分钟后去掉弹力绷带。

sentences.english: It is from Hemosiderosis genistein deposition from the former elastic membrane.
sentences.chinese: 它是由含铁血黄素沉积于前弹力膜而成。

sentences.english: Empire elastic waist, trimmed with a bow.
sentences.chinese: 弹力高腰配有蝴蝶结作点缀。

sentences.english: Mesh is much elastic that make female is much mystic.
sentences.chinese: 网纱弹力好，透气，让女人更具有神秘感。

sentences.english: Traditionally bounciness properties are dependent on the combination of the two materials in contact.
sentences.chinese: 传统上弹力属性依赖于两种相互接触的材质的组合。

sentences.english: There is no resilience to the body, Hence it could relieve tiredness.
sentences.chinese: 对人体无反弹力，从而易于减缓疲劳感。

sentences.english: This product is highly elastic, and flexibility, abrasion resistance and flame resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本产品具有很强的弹力性，伸缩性，耐磨性和阻燃性。

sentences.english: Thick elastic jeans, wear-resistant and dirt-proof, are good companion for traveling.
sentences.chinese: 重磅弹力牛仔裤，耐磨耐脏，出差好搭档。

sentences.english: So be prepared to throw away your ibuprofen and crepe bandages.
sentences.chinese: 所以，准备好扔掉你的布洛芬或是弹力绷带。

definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
